name: Prince of Persia: Tournament Plus
overview: Prince of Persia: Tournament Plus is a custom set of levels based on the original DOS Prince of Persia game. It contains 13 cutom levels modified from the original for the C64. This version was created by "the programmer" and converted to the C64 by Starwinddz and released in the Prince of Persia Total Pack. This modded version is combat-heavy with a custom storyline and primarily uses tiny levels with altered graphics and audio.
